Literature.Title: Synthetic antimicrobial peptidomimetics with therapeutic potential.
Literature.Author: Haug BE, Stensen W, Kalaaji M, Rekdal Ø, Svendsen JS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=70µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=15µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=15µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 27626(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCUG 43316(MIC=30µg/ml)
